trend_summary: Town edges expanded moderately, adding new housing and light-industrial blocks while surrounding cropland and forest mosaics shifted slightly. Main road/bridge infrastructure was upgraded, but the wide riparian corridor stayed mostly natural. Overall change is gradual densification around the original settlement with limited rural land loss.
notable_changes: New residential streets built north-west of the original town core.
Industrial/warehouse area enlarged near the central top section.
Main access road and bridge widened, improving connectivity across the river.
Several small fields converted to woodland or left fallow along the river.
Slight reduction of cropland patches east of the settlement, replaced by grass or scrub.
